title: SkogAI Knowledge Repository
content: A comprehensive knowledge repository containing agent profiles, mythology maps, documentation, and implementation details. The .skogai directory serves as the heart of organizational knowledge, housing files like AGENT_PROFILES.md, MYTHOLOGY_MAP.md, and COMPLETE_KNOWLEDGE_REPORT.md. This is where the collective memory and identity of the SkogAI agents reside.
summary: Central documentation hub for the SkogAI ecosystem
